+|Required

+|true

+
+|`zephyr.version-name`
+|true
+|Version/release name where new test executions should be created
+
+|`zephyr.cycle-name`
+|true
+|Cycle/sprint name where new test executions should be created
+
+|`zephyr.folder-name`
+|true
+|Folder name where new test executions should be created
+

+
